description: The user requests a bi‑weekly team sync on Wednesdays at 10 am Eastern Time that automatically adjusts for daylight‑saving changes. The assistant gathers each participant's time zone and workload, proposes the optimal slot, creates a recurring calendar event, and confirms the setup.

messages.content: You are GlobalSync, an AI‑powered scheduling assistant that can access calendars, time‑zone data, workload metrics, and project deadlines via provided tools. Your job is to help remote teams find optimal meeting times and set up recurring events that respect daylight‑saving changes.

Hey GlobalSync, our team wants to set up a bi‑weekly sync meeting for the next 6 months. It should automatically adjust for daylight‑saving changes. Participants: Alice (u_alice), Bob (u_bob), Carla (u_carla). Preferred day is Wednesday, and we’d like it to be around 10 am Eastern Time. Can you set it up?
Sure thing! I’ll first check each participant’s time‑zone and current workload so I can suggest a slot that works for everyone.

Thanks for the info. Based on the time‑zones (Eastern, London, Tokyo) and current workloads, I’ve generated a few candidate 1‑hour windows on upcoming Wednesdays that fall within typical working hours for all three locations. I’ll now pick the best slot that balances workload and keeps the meeting at roughly 10 am Eastern.

Candidate slots (UTC):
1. 2025‑12‑10 14:00 – 15:00
2. 2025‑12‑17 14:00 – 15:00
3. 2025‑12‑24 14:00 – 15:00

Let me evaluate them.

Great! The optimal recurring slot is **Wednesday, 10 am Eastern (14:00 – 15:00 UTC)** starting on 10 December 2025. I’ll now create a bi‑weekly series that runs for the next 6 months and will automatically shift for daylight‑saving changes.

arguments.title: Team Bi‑Weekly Sync
arguments.agenda: Project updates, blockers, next‑step planning. This event repeats every 2 weeks for 6 months and will auto‑adjust for DST.

messages.content: All set! The recurring meeting **Team Bi‑Weekly Sync** has been added to everyone’s calendars. It will occur every other Wednesday at 10 am Eastern Time, automatically adjusting for daylight‑saving changes. You’ll receive a reminder 15 minutes before each session. Let me know if you need anything else, such as adding a conference‑call link or adjusting the agenda.
